directions: Blend vegan mayonnaise, water, agave nectar, vinegar, chili powder, garlic powder, onion powder, cumin, lime juice, and cayenne pepper in a blender until smooth. Keep refrigerated in an airtight container for 5 to 7 days.
ingredients: 1 cup vegan mayonnaise (such as Follow Your Heart® Veganaise®)
1 tablespoon agave nectar, or more to taste
title: Vegan Creamy Southwest Dressing
